sourcesContent:
import movie from "./movie.json" import styles from "../pages/MovieDatails.module.css" function MovieDetails(){ const imageUrl = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500" + movie.poster_path; return

Titulo: {movie.title}

Genero: {" "} {movie.genres.map(genre => genre.name).join(", ")}

Sinopsis: {movie.overview}

} export default MovieDetails
